/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a vibrant urban landscape. Cars and buses can be seen on the road, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. The colors in the image are vivid, with the blue of the sky contrasting with the green of the trees and the various hues of the buildings.
